author: CBR
description:
Spider-Man Brand New Day fan theories are getting specific, and this Heroes Journey Podcast clip breaks down what actually fits the movie’s current direction.

The conversation zooms in on Marvel/Sony’s leftover multiverse “threads,” especially the symbiote setup and why the hosts think Spider-Man Brand New Day should not rush the symbiote suit. 

We also cover street-level territory: a “Gang War” adaptation in NYC, with Spider-Man pulled into a turf battle as Daredevil and Punisher intervene, plus discussion of Sadie Sink’s potential role.

Chapters:
00:08 – Symbiote Rumors: Feige, Sony, and MCU Setup
01:57 – Why the Symbiote Suit Should Wait Until After Secret Wars
02:31 – Gang War Theory: Street-Level Spider-Man with Punisher
05:20 – Sadie Sink Casting: Black Cat vs Gwen Stacy Debate
10:01 – Savage Hulk, Daredevil, and the “Too Many Eggs” Problem

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 2.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/bs2IWFKQo4M
- More Heroes Journe
title: The Best Spider-Man: Brand New Day Theories Explained
